item.title: Making a Static Website
item.description: When I decided to create a static generated website, I started off with Jekyll even though I had been using R, where the blogdown package would have likely been easier to navigate. I had seen a volume of .github.io domains, so I figured I’d give Jekyll a try (you can check this site out if you want to know more about the differences between common static website generators Jekyll, Hugo and GatsbyJS).
